::Perndabot::

Perndabot keeps his mouth shut at BrightBlade's first comment, his face 
almost turning red. Did he like her? he wonders to himself, or was he just 
fooling around. Perndabot nods at BrightBlade's question.

"I can hold it for a while. I plan to slag some Maximals there, though. He 
might be in for a rough ride," Perndabot reaches out one big hand, holding it 
palm up for the spark.
